documentation.author: Cerner Model
documentation.purpose: When a new patient status order is placed, this rule will discontinue any prior active status orders. Can be used in conjunction with alert rule PSO_DUPLICATE to allow provider decision on duplicate PSO orders.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_LIST_E
templateDefinitions.definition: an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS and an optional order detail of OPT_ORDER_DETAIL that OPT_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_LIST_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS and an optional order detail of OPT_ORDER_DETAIL that OPT_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_COUNT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the number of orders selected in LINK is QUALIFIER NUM
templateDefinitions.description: Evaluates number of orders or clinical events found in preceding template

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SETUP_UPDATE_ORDERS_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Setup GROUP_NAME with ACTION_TYPE orders for QUAL in LINK with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT
templateDefinitions.description: Prepare modify/cancel actions to be sent to the Order Server

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SET_ORDER_DETAIL_DT_A
templateDefinitions.definition: SET_ACTION ORDER_DETAIL equal to OPT_ANCHOR_DT or inherit it from OPT_LINK, offset OPT_OFFSET_DAY days, OPT_OFFSET_HOUR hours and OPT_OFFSET_MIN minutes for orders setup in group(s) GROUP_NAME

column.value: Add details' value if it's not already
Empty detail's value (for NEW order only)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALL_ORDER_SERVER_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Call order server with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT
templateDefinitions.description: Send orders and actions from prior templates to the Order Server

values.value: PSO Admit to Inpatient Behavioral Health
PSO Admit to Inpatient GIP Hospice
PSO Admit to Inpatient Behavioral Health
PSO Admit to Inpatient GIP Hospice
PSO Admit to Inpatient Behavioral Health
PSO Admit to Inpatient GIP Hospice
